Intervention: • Use 3cc of vaginal lubricant containing lactate before intercourse or sleep for 8wks (at least 3 times a week)
• Vaginal lubricant containing lactate: vaginal application of at least 3cc of lubricant containing lactate at the time of sexual intercourse or before sleeping for 8 weeks (at least 3 times/week)
• Use 3cc of placebo vaginal lubricant before intercourse or sleep for 8wks (at least 3 times a week)
• Vaginal lubricating placebo: vaginal application of at least 3cc of placebo lubricant at the time of sexual intercourse or before sleeping for 8 weeks (at least 3 times/week)
Eligibility: • Survivors of breast cancer over 20 years of age
Premenopausal at the time of diagnosis
Newly developed dyspareunia after cancer treatment
Recently (< 2 months) initiation or discontinuation of hormonal therapy (tamoxifene, etc.)
Other chronic diseases that seriously disturb sex life
Results: Change in pain score of the female sexual function index

The Female Sexual Function Index is a self-reported instrument of 19 elements used to assess the key dimensions of female sexual function over the past 4 weeks with a total of six domains under analysis. Each of the six specific domains (desire, excitement, lubrication, orgasm, satisfaction and pain) analysed in the FSFI is noted on a scale ranging from 1.2 to 6.0 (desire), from 0 to 6.0 (excitation, lubrication, orgasm and pain) or from 0.8 to 6.0 (satisfaction), with higher scores indicating better performance.
Title of the arm/group: Vaginal lubricant containing milk
Description of the arm/group: apply 3cc of vaginal lubricant containing lactate before intercourse or sleep for 8wks (at least 3 times a week)
• Vaginal lubricant containing lactate: vaginal application of at least 3cc of lubricant containing lactate at the time of sexual intercourse or before sleeping for 8 weeks (at least 3 times/week)
Unit of measurement: units on a scale 1.15 (1.59)
Description of the arm/group: apply 3cc of placebo vaginal lubricant before intercourse or sleep for 8wks (at least 3 times a week)
• Vaginal lubricating placebo: vaginal application of at least 3cc of placebo lubricant at the time of sexual intercourse or before sleeping for 8 weeks (at least 3 times/week)
Unit of measurement: units on a scale 1.05 (1.54)
